com.communote.server.api.core.image.type

Class CustomizableImageTypeDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.api.core.image.type.DefaultImageTypeDescriptor
      • com.communote.server.api.core.image.type.CustomizableImageTypeDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageTypeDescriptor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntityBannerImageDescriptor, EntityProfileImageDescriptor, UserImageDescriptor

    public abstract class CustomizableImageTypeDescriptor
extends DefaultImageTypeDescriptor
    Image type descriptor that allows the customization of some of the scaling settings. These customizations are stored in a client configuration property.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • setScaleSettings

        public void setScaleSettings(Integer verticalAlignment,
                             Integer horizontalAlignment,
                             Color backgroundColor)
        Set the scale settings of this type descriptor.
        Parameters:
        verticalAlignment - a value which describes the vertical alignment of the image within the background when it is scaled. A value of less than 0 means to place the image at the top edge, a value of 0 leads to centering the image and a value greater than 0 means to place the image at the bottom edge. Null can be used to reset this setting the default value.
        horizontalAlignment - a value which describes the horizontal alignment of the image within the background when it is scaled. A value of less than 0 means to place the image at the top left, a value of 0 leads to centering the image and a value greater than 0 means to place the image at the right edge. Null can be used to reset this setting the default value.
        backgroundColor - the background color to use to fill unoccupied pixels when scaling an image. Null can be used to reset this setting the default value.
